footnotes: 1 Ba suratu oyo: 2, 3, 7, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 19, 20, 26, 27, 28, 29, 30, 31, 32, 36, 38, 40, 41, 42, 43, 44, 45, 46, 50, 68, Bibandeli na yango ezali ba letele oyo bantina na yango eyebani te, bandimbola na yango eyebi kaka ye moko Allah.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
